ResearchProjectDef.label: The first jump
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Traders tell stories about nomads of the skies who rode chariots of timber and cloth among the clouds, for some this may sound ludicrous...but perhaps with a little bit of effort and creativity we can make legend in to reality..."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Riding in the Winds
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Wood,cloth and fire, together to bring us prosperity, now with our acquired knowledge we can try a bolder and more useful sail ship design!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Merchant of the skies
ResearchProjectDef.description: "During the age of the wind rich traders had not to deal with the nuisances of taming pack animals or travel dangerous roads,they would ascend to the skies with their precious cargo in colorful sailships and rode the winds to their destination, something we can try ourselves."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Winds of War
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Inevitably the winds of war will come to us eventually, and we must be ready, with proper materials and experience we can make a vessel to meet our foes head on."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conquering the Winds
ResearchProjectDef.description: "A new touch in a simple concept can bring a lot of improvement!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wind jewel
ResearchProjectDef.description: "With all we learned so far we can go beyond..."
